Megaton saw Starscreem coming towards him. The bot didn't seem to happy abo=
ut the mutants arival. He seemed a little disgruntaled like a postman with =
an automatic weapon. 

Megaton stopped for a moment to ascess the situation=
. "Yes Starscreem it is I." the memory of the missle going off in his mouth=
 still left a bad taste in his mouth. He'd hoped for a warm arrival, in a v=
olcano what other kind was there?

s 
  under water sounds like an excellent idea. 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::My Predacons =
wake up and go outside.  There they see Drillbit talking to 
  Megaton. Sta=
rscream cannot beleive his eyes:: 
  Starscream: YOU? 
  ::He remembered th=
eir dogfight back in the arctic:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Atma and Psuedo immeadiatel=
y see that Burning Hammer is the enemy:: 
  Atma: Thats right, were here to=
 help you. 
  ::Atma takes out his gun and fires 25 shots at Burning Hammer=
.  Psuedo fires 
  2 missles from each of his two guns at Burning Hammer:: =
